sentences.en: 96 per cent of the eligible employees took up the offer.
sentences.cn: 符合条件的雇员有96%接受了这个条件。

sentences.en: A dance at home would be more eligible.
sentences.cn: 在家开个舞会我看更好.

sentences.en: All the young men at Pulpit Hill who were eligible - those who were twenty - one - were going into service.
sentences.cn: 讲坛山上所有适龄的青年 -- 也就是说,所有二十一 岁 的青年 -- 都去入伍了.

sentences.en: Although sentenced to life, he will become eligible for parole after serving 10 years.
sentences.cn: 虽然被判终身监禁，但是他在服刑10年后可以申请假释。

sentences.en: At the same time, we encouraged eligible large state - owned enterprises to get listed after the stockholding system was established.
sentences.cn: 同时, 鼓励符合条件的 国有 大型企业改制上市.

sentences.en: Fertility - Sparing Alternative to Radical Hysterectomy: How Many Patients May Be Eligible?
sentences.cn: 保留生育能力而 非 根治性全子宫切除术: 有多少患者适合这样的选择?

sentences.en: He says that the match might be an eligible one for me.
sentences.cn: 他说,这订亲事对我也许还是可取的.

sentences.en: He was by long odds the most eligible young man in town.
sentences.cn: 他无论在哪一方面都是镇上最合格的年轻人.

sentences.en: His agegroup became eligible for the army.
sentences.cn: 他的同龄人应当应征入伍.

sentences.en: It'signifies that this young person is eligible to assume the crown.
sentences.cn: 它表明我们的这位年轻人符合了继承王位的条件.

sentences.en: Men and women of eighteen and above are eligible to vote.
sentences.cn: 年龄在十八岁以上的男女有投票表决权.

sentences.en: Of course , before the war, Will would certainly not have been an eligible suitor.
sentences.cn: 在战前威尔当然不是个合格的求婚者.

sentences.en: She, with the truest affection , had been planning a most eligible connection for him.
sentences.cn: 她正怀着最真挚的母爱为他筹划一门最适当的婚姻.

sentences.en: Stephen was regarded as an eligible bachelor.
sentences.cn: 斯蒂芬被认为是一个钻石王老五。

sentences.en: Students on a part-time course are not eligible for a loan.
sentences.cn: 非全日制课程的学生没有资格申请贷款。

words.tran_cn: 合格者；适任者；有资格者

trans.tran_cn: 有资格的，（作为结婚对象）合适的
trans.tran_en: someone who is eligible for something is able or allowed to do it, for example because they are the right age

trans.tran_cn: 合格者；适任者；有资格者
